labels.name: epic
labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['加拿大', '德国', '爱尔兰', '科技', '电讯服务'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['法国', '新加坡', '瑞士', '周期性消费品和服务', '公用事业'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Greece', '菲律宾', '塞浦路斯', '交易所买卖基金（ETF）', '科技'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Greece', '菲律宾', '塞浦路斯', '交易所买卖基金（ETF）']

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['大不列颠', '日本', '新加坡', '卫生保健', '电讯服务'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['大不列颠']
